Class Flight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Flight
public class Flight extends Object
The Flight class represents a flight in the booking system.
Author:
Ashlesha Shrestha, Nishan Shrestha

  • Constructor Details

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int capacity, double price, double cancellationRebookFee, int status)
      Constructs a new Flight.
      Parameters:
      id - the flight ID
      flightNumber - the flight number
      origin - the origin of the flight
      destination - the destination of the flight
      departureDate - the departure date of the flight
      capacity - the capacity of the flight
      price - the price of the flight
      cancellationRebookFee - the cancellation/rebook fee
      status - the status of the flight

  • Method Details

    • populate

      public void populate(FlightBookingSystem fbs) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Populates the flight with passengers from the booking system.
      Parameters:
      fbs - the flight booking system
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if an error occurs while populating

    • addPassenger

      public void addPassenger(Customer passenger) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a passenger to the flight.
      Parameters:
      passenger - the passenger to add
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if the flight is at full capacity

    • removePassenger

      public void removePassenger(Customer passenger) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Removes a passenger from the flight.
      Parameters:
      passenger - the passenger to remove
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if the passenger is not booked on this flight

    • getAvailableSeats

      public int getAvailableSeats()
      Gets the number of available seats on the flight.
      Returns:
      the number of available seats

    • calculatePrice

      public double calculatePrice(LocalDate bookingDate)
      Calculates the price of the flight based on the booking date. If the booking date is near, the price is increased.
      Parameters:
      bookingDate - The date of booking.
      Returns:
      The calculated price.
